item.title: CVE-2023-47550|2024-08-28T15:09:59.857Z -- rednao -- donations%20made%20easy%20%E2%80%93%20smart%20donations
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in RedNao Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations: from n/a through 4.0.12.
